title: FF3300 issue 2 out now!
content:
the magazine is avaible on this url:  
 [http://www.metastyle.it](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163752/http:/www.metastyle.it/ "http://www.metastyle.it")

if you have any problem, use this url:  
 [http://www.metastyle.it/ff3300n2.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163752/http:/www.metastyle.it/ff3300n2.pdf "http://www.metastyle.it/ff3300n2.pdf")

this issue, with 240 pages, italian and english language,  
has a special about Leonardo Sonnoli, the relations between  
graphic design and music, and a lot of other contents.

we also invite you to our conference in BARI, italy, in the 21 March,  
faculty of architecture, for a discussion about the future of the  
multimedia publishing.

metastyle art group.
